thread.title: Black Stars players depart Washington for their respective clubs after friendly draw with Canada
thread.title_full: Black Stars players depart Washington for their respective clubs after friendly draw with Canada

title: Black Stars players depart Washington for their respective clubs after friendly draw with Canada
text:
12:10 CET Black Stars players depart Washington for their respective clubs after friendly draw with Canada - www.ghanasoccernet.com Black Stars players at the Washington Dulles International Airport 
The Black Stars players have left Washington for their respective clubs after fighting from a goal down to draw 1-1 with Canada in an international friendly on Tuesday. 
The players took a group picture at the Washington Dulles International Airport on Wednesday evening where they are to catch their flights to their respective bases. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
